import { getSelectedElements } from "../scene";
export const showSelectedShapeActions = (appState, elements) => Boolean(!appState.viewModeEnabled && appState.activeTool.type !== "custom" && (appState.editingElement || appState.activeTool.type !== "selection" && appState.activeTool.type !== "eraser" && appState.activeTool.type !== "hand") || getSelectedElements(elements, appState).length);
